content:
All the gym bros: “skipping is for dorks”.
All the track athletes: “skipping and stride work is how I smoke everyone in running and in the squat rack”. 
Distance runners: “my knees can come up past my waist while I’m moving?”
The rest of us: “can we just call it Plyos?”

What as an American citizen would/do you need from the academic research community to restore your faith in @NIH @CDCgov? They live and breathe on your taxes so please do tell. Be constructive. What do you need now? Not 5 years ago. (Although needs now can relate to that).
